meanings.definition: A chemical element with the symbol Cl and atomic number 17.
meanings.sent1: Chlorines are found in salt, making it taste salty.
meanings.sent2: The periodic table includes chlorines as one of the elements.
meanings.sent3: The chlorine family reunion was full of salty jokes.
meanings.sent4: Her sharp wit cut through the conversation like chlorines through dirt.
meanings.sent5: The greenish hue of chlorines in the lab flask was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: A group of chemical compounds containing chlorine, typically used as disinfectants or bleaching agents.
meanings.sent1: The pool cleaner added chlorines to keep the water clear.
meanings.sent2: Some household cleaners contain chlorines for their disinfecting properties.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought the bleach with chlorines was a new toy.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as chlorines, lighting up the room.
meanings.sent5: The smell of chlorines in the laundry room was overpowering.
